metadata.name: Blazing Eyes #1
metadata.description:
Kim Tae-hyup's works began with the awareness of oneâ€™s identity within social and interpersonal influences that form externalized subjectivity. The artist uses props that personify emotions such as anxiety, confusion, and desire in works that much resemble picture diaries, and describes emotions the way colors appear or disappear. 

#NFTart  #eyes  #black&white  #physical-based
